attributes.title: no ğŸ’–
attributes.review: Ok so I wanted to see what all the white supremacists weâ€™re talking and find the truth about our fellow Cheeto Puff (I think heâ€™s the president) so I downloaded the app. I first noticed that is was restricted to ages 16 and below, and obviously Iâ€™m 18 but that means Donald Trump really isnâ€™t for everyone, this is very disappointing as we need to educated our younger generation. I opened the app and it was requiring me to have messages sent to me from a random email and phone number that i didnâ€™t know, and I figured it was going to be spam mail but i decided to give the app a chance and finish my profile. Next thing I noticed was at first the app was working great, it was smooth and fast but then a bunch of viruses and bugs started coming onto my brand new iPhone 11 Pro Max and it was very disappointing. I proceeded to take my iPhone 11 Pro Max to the apple store which costs as much as getting a brand new iPhone 11 Pro Max to fix, but i did it anyway. After all this I still wanted to give the app a chance so I went back on the app and noticed that I could check in with the family members of the White House so of course I wanted to check on my boy Barron but i noticed itâ€™s like he didnâ€™t even exist! Very upsetting! This app got on my last straw as it asked me to campaign for Donald by going door to door. After going to the last rally I got Corona so I canâ€™t go door to door anymore although they are are spamming me with emails and messages persisting I do. Very annoying! Keep in mind I am not a troll and I wanted to give this terrible app a chance but it failed the average standards and made me spend tons of money. Very disappointing Mr.President do better.

I immediately told my best friend Carole. And she had a HEART ATTACK. I loved her sweet potatoe pies. May she rest in peace oh lawd.
